description:
It's the season of hot chocolate, cuddling by the fire, and of course, snow… Then a snow day is announced when kids jump for joy and we have come up with a list of fun and creative activities to help keep the kids occupied outside the house.这是热巧克力的季节，是窝在壁炉边取暖的季节，当然，还是玩雪的季节！天空开始飘雪，孩子们高兴地蹦蹦跳跳。这里我们列出了一张清单，写下既有趣又有创意的活动，让孩子们在户外玩得不亦乐乎！

1. Snow Angel-ing画个雪罗汉

Creating the perfect snow angel requires commitment and athletic skill, and you know it.要画出线条完美的雪罗汉，需要全神贯注，还需要运动技能，你懂的。

2. Snowman Building堆雪人

“You call that a snowman? More like snowboy.”“你说那是雪人？我觉得他是雪孩子。”

3. Belly Sledding贴地式滑雪

YEAH BABY!! BELLY SLEDDING!!欧耶！贴地滑雪！

4. Throwing Snow at Cats雪球砸猫咪

The cats love it, you love it…why not make a sport out of it?喵星人喜欢这样玩，你也喜欢——所以为什么不将它作为一个游戏呢？

5. Car Digging雪中挖车

You have to get rid of all of the snow in order to win.为了赢得游戏（什么鬼？！）你必须把车上所有的雪都弄干净。

6. Snow Drawing雪中画画

Right at the intersection of sport and art: spart.运动与艺术的完美结合：艺术运动！

7. Snow Birthing破雪而出

This is that cool game where you are buried up to your armpits in snow and you have to dig your way out. First one out of the hole wins!这是一个很棒的游戏，你将自己齐腋窝处以下埋入雪堆中，然后再努力爬出来，最先爬出来的人获胜。

8. Snow Shoveling铲雪

Just shoveling piles of snow, but as a professional sport.把雪铲成堆，这是一个技术活。

9. Snowball Rolling滚雪球

Just like a normal running race, except not, because you’re pushing snowballs.这看起来像普通的赛跑，然而并不是这样！因为你要推着雪球往前跑。

10. Paw Shoveling猫爪铲雪

Like shoveling your way out of your house, but instead of a shovel you use your paws. In fact, shovels are cheating! If cats can do it, we can do it.这个类似于一般的在家门前铲出一条雪道，不过你用的是爪子而不是铲子。事实上，用铲子铲雪是作弊！既然喵星人可以做到，我们也可以！

11. Snow Denying无视雪天

Contestants pretend it's summer and stay outdoors for as long as possible. The last one standing is the winner! It's not for everyone.参与游戏者假装现在是夏季，并尽可能长时间地呆在户外，坚持到最后的人获胜！这个游戏可不是人人都敢玩的。

12. Snow Swimming雪中游泳

There's a right way and a wrong way to do this, and we don't need to tell you which is which.有正确的玩法，也有不正确的玩法，不用说你也知道哪种正确、哪种不正确了吧。
